title: Orange Chili Sauce
notes: A little bland, but a little bit goes a long way and should easy to use later
ingredients: 1 tablespoon arrowroot starch mixed with 1 tablespoon water
instructions: Set a nonstick skillet on medium heat.
Add orange, chili sauce, soy sauce, coconut sugar and sesame oil.  Bring to a gentle simmer.
